summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2865 for the improvement of Market Street, from Eighth Avenue Northwest to Eleventh Avenue Northwest, all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of sewers therein together with all appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 34794, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
